title: Cannot enable add-ons
content:
Some of my add-ons have disabled themselves and there is no option to enable. I found a potential solution at this thread https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1276602 but wanted to clarify what to delete in the Profile Folder. I can't continue that thread because it is too old apparently.

The help says to: Delete all extensions* fileS and compatibility.ini in the Firefox profile folder to reset the extensions registry. There is only ONE FILE starting with extensionS. That would be extensions.json

It says to delete extensions* fileS. Could someone please clarify if I'm supposed to delete: extension-preferences.json extension-settings.json extensions Folder

Thank you!
creator: notthatyoko

title: SYNC'ING OF HARDWARE SETTINGS
content:
Hello there, 

I would like to know how to disable sync'ing  some harware related options ( which depends on the machine) like harware acceleration, theme etc, which i prefer to use different settings for different devices. seen that all these settings get merged when I am changing for one device.
creator: bhaskarsharma.pattambi

title: numpad misbehaves in Virtual machines in Firefox extended support release
content:
Hello Firefox Community and suport team,

Hope you all and your families are safe in these tough times.

I'm using Firefox extended support release 78.12.0esr (https://www.screencast.com/t/DfQBOa0GcDG), everything is working fine unless I use any virtual machine inside that, numpad starts misbehaving.

Whenever I type any number using number keys given below function keys, it works fine. But when I type any number from numpad situated at right side of full keyboard, it starts misbehaving. It types an alphabet with every keys. Video screenshot of the issue: https://www.screencast.com/t/ovucf32Tpz1d

Can anyone please check and help me to get rid of this issue?

Thanking You, Om

Om Ji Verma
creator: omji.verma

title: can't seem to change audio input
content: Hi all, I'm having an annoying problem. A couple weeks ago, I was having major computer problems that required me to completely delete and recreate my user profile. I apparently hadn't logged into Google Voice since then, but decided to try and call a friend from that number today. When I tried to call her though, she couldn't hear me. Subsequent testing revealed that the problem is that Firefox isn't using my computer's microphone as the input, but rather it's taking the input from Stereo Mix, despite the default input device on my computer being the microphone. How do I change this within Firefox? I also have a wireless headset that I use sometimes, but when I plug that in, none of the audio switches to it. If desired, is there a way to get Firefox to use this device for audio output?
creator: cavbob1993

title: Firefox crashes when system file dialog is displayed?
content:
Before I switch to Microsoft Edge.

Does anyone have a working solution to Firefox crashing on me every time the system file dialog opens in order for me to save something?

This is an ongoing problem and I don't seem to be the only one with this issue.

So is there a fix or should I just stop wasting my time with Firefox and move to Microsoft Edge like so many have done already?

Thanks
creator: cybagirl

title: firefox browser
content:
Problems with glitzy new browser: 1. Home page replaced by a mystery page. That page appears even without an Internet connection. 2. Address bar does not allow a keyed or pasted URL. 3. Colors at top of screen blot out the min, max, and close buttons and make the open page buttons unreadable.except for active page button. 4. Moving to a new, or even a follow-up, page is slower.

I have been with Mozilla ever since the early days with the Netscape browser, and have always been happy with the many updates, that is, until this one. Get rid of the colors, and make the address bar functional again. I found the solution to the "mystery page" in Tools/Settings and reclaimed my home page, "homepage." I hope it holds.
creator: burnham33

title: Menu, saved bookmarks, too black.
content: Please & Thank you, for many months, w/dark style screen, my menu, saved bookmarks & more (drop downs) have been unread-ably black. (History is light)
